mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POKEMON( ID, ENGNAME, TYPE1, TYPE2, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, HP, ATTACK, DEFENSE, SATTACK, SDEFENSE, SPEED, TOTAL, IMG, SIMG ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{engName}, #{type1}, #{type2}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{hp}, #{attack}, #{defense}, #{sAttack}, #{sDefense}, #{speed}, #{total}, #{img}, #{sImg}, )
